※chatgptが一晩(10秒)でやってくれました

小説を出力してもらってイメージを鮮明にしてから描くと構図決まりやすい

「……ご、ごはんと……お酒……」

　声がわずかに上ずり、妖夢は慌てて視線を床板に落とした。
　盆を持つ手にも、わずかな震えが伝わる。

　幽々子はそんな様子を楽しむように、ゆっくりと妖夢を見上げる。

「あら……どうしたの、妖夢？」

「……い、いえ……べ、別に……！」

　妖夢はぷいっと顔を背けたまま、必死に平静を装う。

（……あんな格好で、あんな脚で……反則です……）

　心の中でそう叫びながら、妖夢は深く息を吸い、ようやく盆を置いた。
　その横で、幽々子は相変わらず気持ちよさそうに、無防備なまま微笑んでいる。

　そのことが、余計に妖夢の心をかき乱しているとも知らずに。

幽々子はそのことを自覚しているのか、していないのか。
　半眼のまま、くすっと小さく笑って、寝返りを打つ。

「ふふ……暑いわねぇ……」

　その動きに合わせて、衣がさらにずれ、脚の付け根までがあっさりと視界に入る。

　魂魄妖夢は、思わず息を止めた。

（……む、無理……）

　直視できなかった。
　視線を向けた瞬間、胸の奥がきゅっと縮み、顔が熱くなるのがはっきりと分かる。

　なのに、見てはいけないと思うほど、逆に意識してしまう。
　視界の端に映るその白さ、そのなめらかな曲線、その無防備さが、否応なく感覚を刺激してくる。

Tell others that this is happening, spread it around.

images.alt:
Der Verlag Splitter Manga+ bringt den Slice of Life-Manga »Ie ga Suki na Hito« von Chiaki Ida nach Deutschland und feiert damit ihr Deutschland-Debüt! Der Einzelband erscheint nach aktueller Planung am 8. Oktober 2026.

In Japan liefen die einzelnen Kapitel zunächst im Comic Ruelle Magazin, bevor sie im Februar 2023 durch den Verlag Jitsugyou no Nihonsha in einem Band zusammengefasst wurden.

📅 Start 》8. Oktober 2026
💶 Preis 》14,00€ Einzelband
🏷️ Genre 》Slice of Life
🖊 Autorin & Zeichnung 》Chiaki Ida
📺 Anime-Adaption 》Keine

📜 Beschreibung (Splitter Manga+)》
Am allerliebsten bin ich zu Hause! Jeder Tag birgt eine neue Geschichte. Mal ist sie fröhlich, und mal ist sie traurig. Aber egal ob man lacht oder weint, zu Hause kann man sich fallen lassen und sich sicher und geborgen fühlen. Vom Lieblingsessen, das auf dem Herd köchelt, bis zur wohlverdienten Kaffeepause: Wahres Glück findet sich in den kleinen Momente des Lebens. Momente, die man am besten zu Hause genießen kann. Wenn ihr das genauso seht, oder wenn ihr eine kleine Auszeit vom stressigen Alltag braucht, dann werdet ihr diesen wunderschönen Feelgood-Farbmanga lieben!

Mehr Details in der Bildbeschreibung.

#WeakestTamer #SaijakuTamer #SplitterMangaPlus #MangaDE 
© 2020 Tou Fukino, Honobonoru500, Illustrations by Nama / TO Books

images.alt:
Der Verlag Splitter Manga+ bringt den Fantasy-Adventure-Manga »Saijaku Tamer wa Gomi Hiroi no Tabi wo Hajimemashita« von Honobonoru500 (Story) & Tou Fukino (Illustrationen) nach Deutschland! Band 1 erscheint nach aktueller Planung am 6. August 2026.

In Japan läuft die Manga-Adaption seit Februar 2020 im Magazin Comic Corona von TO Books und umfasst derzeit acht Bände. Die zugrunde liegende Light Novel von Honobonoru500 (Story) und Nama (Illustrationen) zählt aktuell 15 Bände.

📅 Start 》6. August 2026
💶 Preis 》10,50€
🏷️ Genre 》Fantasy, Adventure 
🖊 Autor 》Honobonoru500
🎨 Zeichnungen 》Tou Fukino
📺 Anime-Adaption 》Eine Staffel (Crunchyroll) 

📜 Beschreibung (Splitter Manga+)》
Mit gerade einmal 5 Jahren erhielt Ivy die Begabung des Bestienzähmens. Allerdings ist sie »sternlos«, der allerniedrigste Rang, den man in einer Begabung haben kann! Und sternlose Kinder sind in Ivys Dorf als Ketzer verachtet, also wird sie von ihrer Familie verstoßen. Im Wald findet sie Zuflucht bei einer alten Hellseherin, die jedoch schon wenige Jahre darauf verstirbt – und die Schuld dafür wird ausgerechnet Ivy gegeben! Auf der Flucht vor ihren eigenen Leuten trifft sie auf ein lächerlich schwaches Schleim-Monster, das einzige Monster, das Ivy zähmen kann. Endlich hat sie einen Plan: Zusammen mit ihrem neuen Schleim Sora macht sie sich auf, den Müll anderer Leute aufzusammeln, um ihr Leben in den Griff zu kriegen.

record.text: “oh my stars, how unladylike of me to curse in front of a gentleman” is a line I liked writing
someone on LinkedIn was being annoyingly “well actually” contrarian about Grok

images.alt:
LinkedIn post reading:

Everyone is calling the Grok recent AI image incidents “disgusting, immoral” and alike words.

They are totally right.

However, those words miss the real failure.

Nothing shocking happened technically, in fact what happened was predictable.

When a system is built to demonstrate what is possible, but not to prove what is prohibited, the first people to discover the boundary will not be auditors or ethicists.

They will be users testing the edges.

This is not about bad engineers.
It is not about a lack of values.
It is about a familiar pattern:

👉Capability is shipped because it excites investors and signals power
👉Responsibility is described in policies, not enforced in system behaviour
👉Safeguards exist, but they are not blocking, provable, or auditable
👉Harm is discovered publicly, after deployment
👉Controls are added retrospectively

We have seen this pattern before in industrial safety, chemicals, media, finance.

The scandal is never the output.
The scandal is that the output was the first real test.

Calling it “disgusting” feels moral.
Calling it a governance failure is accurate.

Until responsibility is treated as a hard system requirement, not a principle, not a promise, not a press release these incidents will keep repeating, just with different content and different victims.

This was not an ethics failure.
It was a control failure.

Control failures are not fixed with outrage, they are fixed with evidence, constraints and enforceable design.

Reply from me: Little known fact: we are not paying by the fucking word when it comes to describing something. A thing can be more than one adjective. This is annoying “well actually” contrarianism about—just to be very clear—the creation of CSAM and perpetuation of image-based sexual abuse.

Reply from OP: Quinn Yeargain Surely a professor of law can make this point without resorting to profanity.  The outputs are disgusting and that is precisely why the real failure is governance.
Harmful content is not an accident; it is what surfaces when systems lack enforceable constraints.
Moral outrage describes the damage. Governance analysis explains why it happened and how to prevent it.

Reply from me: oh my stars, how unladylike of me to curse in front of a gentleman.

external.description: Many fans thought the 2024 NBA champion Boston Celtics would struggle this season and await the return of superstar forward Jayson Tatum from injury. However, through 36 games, Boston has moved up to the No. 3 seed in the East and has won two-thirds of its conference matchups. The biggest story coming out of the Celtics camp now is if and how they plan to avoid the luxury tax. Aside from the two $50 million men, Tatum and Jaylen Brown, the most expensive player on the Celtics roster is shooting guard Anfernee Simmons.
external.title: Celtics Identified As Trade Fit For 25-Year-Old Sixth Man

record.bridgyOriginalText:
Three Kings and a Princess

Frankincense to Offer Have I: Part V

#FanFiction #TheApothecaryDiaries #TearmoonEmpire
#wss366 bug (Implied) #MastoPrompt

[Continued from previous post]

The room they entered looked like it had when Tianyu had been here, except Jinshi rested on the best cushion. His skin was a healthy pink, not what Mao had expected. He was as beautiful as ever. Mao was sure that if he even hinted he was interested in another girl, that girl would happily knife Mao in her sleep. Wars were fought and nations ruined over women less lovely. Only the scar on his face marred his comeliness.

He rose as she dropped to her knees. The room was a public place, and proper reverence was due someone so august.

“That won’t do,” he said. “I have come to raise you up.” His smile lingered too long. “Sit. No matter the cost, I intend to have you.”

Mao crossed the room as Joka began playing a romantic piece on the erhu, then lowered herself onto the cushion.

Jinshi clapped once. “Rice wine, from my consort-to-be.” He gestured to a tray bearing steamed buns, a bowl of salty pickled plums, and another of salt-roasted chestnuts. “Have a bun while we wait.”

His overly jocular manner struck Mao as odd. It was unlike him.

When she didn’t reach for the food, he took a bun between his fingers and lifted it to her lips. The sight and smell turned her stomach, but refusal was unthinkable. She bit down.

The mild sweetness of lotus paste and pounded rice, the faint nuttiness of sesame, spread across her tongue. Under other circumstances, she would have savored it. This time, she swallowed with effort, willing her body not to betray her.

“When had Jinshi become so careless with his power?” Mao wondered. Even someone as obtuse as he should have noticed how unwell she felt. Yet his smile never wavered. There was not a flicker of concern, as if her condition were beneath his notice.

[Continued tomorrow in “Frankincense to Offer Have I: Part VI”]

#MicroFiction #TootFic #Serial #NMFic #ApothecaryDiaries

value.text:
Larian writing director says gen AI won't be used for the new Divinity game's writing

Says they tinkered at it for research, and it created work that was "at best" 3/10 in terms of quality, inferior to even his own worst human-written drafts

www.reddit.com/r/Games/comm...

images.alt:
The stance applies to writing as well. We don't have any text generation touching our dialogues, journal entries or other writing in Divinity.

To answer your second question, 'how does generated placeholder text benefit development over simple stub text'"- it doesn't. We had a limited group experimenting with tools to generate text, but the results hit a 3/10 at best and those tools are for research purposes, not for use in Divinity. Even my worst first drafts - and there are a LOT of them - are at least a 4/10 (although Swen might disagree :p), and the amount of iteration required to get even individual lines to the quality we want is enormous. From the initial stub to the line we record and ship, there are a great many eyes and hands involved in getting a dialogue right.

value.text:
Looks like ICE is now cracking down on … Native Americans. 

This letter was just posted by the chairman of the Standing Rock Sioux Tribe in North/South Dakota:

“Our Nation is a sovereign government and our members are not immigrants. We are not subject to immigration enforcement on our own lands.”

images.alt:
ANDING ROCK
Standing Rock Sioux Tribe
The Office of Chairman Sitting Bear
P.O. BOx D
Fort Yates, ND 58538
CHAIRMAN SITTING BEAR'S STATEMENT REGARDING SRST PUBLIC SAFETY
JANUARY 9, 2026
I have been receiving reports and evidence of First Nations people being racially targeted, assaulted, and detained by the federal agency Immigration & Customs Enforcement (ICE). We want to remind our members to be safe and proactive by carrying with you at a minimum your tribal identification cards or a copy of your degree of Indian Blood. Our tribal identification affirms our citizenship and political status.
Our Nation is a sovereign government and our members are not immigrants. We are not subject to immigration enforcement on our own lands. Any federal activity within our boundaries must recognize and respect our tribal sovereignty, treaty obligations, and established jurisdictional boundaries. Any ICE presence or activity within our lands is not authorized, not welcome, and will be addressed. Unauthorized personnel will be escorted off our lands.

This is exactly the same that happened leading up to the financial crisis in 2008: Investors ignored the warnings and made big bucks on the housing market.

The investors were bailed out and didn't receive any jail sentences. So, they went over to AI startups and laundered their money.

Winter weather took hold across the Indo-Gangetic Plain in early January 2026, bringing dense fog and cold temperatures to much of the flat, fertile lands that span from Pakistan and northern India to Bangladesh. This image shows low-lying clouds over the…

external.description: Winter weather took hold across the Indo-Gangetic Plain in early January 2026, bringing dense fog and cold temperatures to much of the flat, fertile lands that span from Pakistan and northern India to Bangladesh. This image shows low-lying clouds over the delta on the morning of January 6, captured by the MODIS (Moderate Resolution Imaging Spectroradiometer) on NASA’s Terra satellite. Dense fog, particularly radiation fog, is common this time of year, forming when ground temperatures are cool, winds are light, and moisture is abundant near the surface.

record.text: That’s kind of nuts, though? Enterprise admins can’t stop users from installing Copilot manually? That can’t be right..
This is how twitter users sound when complaining about Bluesky

普段はGoogle日本語入力にお世話になっているけれど、新しく「Copilot Keyboard」なるものを発見して、好奇心に勝てずにインストールしてみた。
Microsoft製ということで、Windowsとの親和性にはかなり期待している。
最新の言葉に強かったり、AIがサポートしてくれたりと、これからの進化が楽しみな要素が詰まっている感じ。 ただ、まだお試しの段階だから、使い勝手や安定性がどうなるかは未知数。 しばらくじっくり使ってみて、自分の指に馴染まないようなら潔く元の環境に戻すつもり。 新しいツールを触る時の、この独特のソワソワする感覚がたまらない。

久しぶりの、あおぞらー！だがしかし、この後は雨予報。
タイヤの空気圧を確認しようと外に出る。車を見ると雪が溶けて水滴になっているし、外はしっかりプラスの気温。氷点下独特のあの肌に刺さるような冷たさがないから、外に出た瞬間に「あ、今日は高いな」って直感で分かってしまう。
今日はこれから弘前に行く予定。久しぶりに雨も雪も降っていない穏やかな朝だったので、出発前にタイヤの空気圧もチェックしてきた。数値も問題なし、準備万端。
家族が起きてくるのを待ちながら、まずは自分の朝食を済ませて一息ついているところ。
雨に変わる前に、少しでもスムーズに移動できればいいな。

何より、あの雪道を走る極限のストレスから解放される。
​車内でゆったり過ごしながら、SNSで必死に誰かの運転に愚痴を吐いている人たちを眺める側になれる。
これこそが、雪国の冬を賢く生き抜く「本当の余裕」だと思う。

Small AI win of the day: I needed employee IDs for people who no longer report to me (so I can't see it in the HR system). Copilot was able to trawl my emails and identify old performance statements and expense reports with the info. All things I had access to but never would have found myself.
I love it and hate it in equal measure
Ooh good strategy! I'll keep that in the back pocket. The company is pretty paranoid about brand integrity and data security, so just holding my breath right now

Microsoft has finally listened to its... business users.
Windows 11 Beta and Dev insider build 26220.7535 has a new group policy to remove Microsoft Copilot app.

It's located in User Configuration -> Administrative Templates -> Windows Components -> Windows AI

However, there's a catch...

images.alt: Screenshot of the Windows 11 desktop showing the new group policy named Remove Microsoft Copilot app introduced in Windows 11 Insider Beta and Dev build 26220.7535, when enabled this policy will uninstall the Microsoft Copilot app by default as long the following conditions are met, Microsoft 365 Copilot and Microsoft Copilot are both installed, The Microsoft Copilot app was not installed by the user, and The Microsoft Copilot app was not launched in the last 28 days. The user can still reinstall the Microsoft Copilot app.

GitHub Copilotで利用可能なAIモデルの特徴と使い分けについて解説している。
GPT、Claude、Geminiなど、モデルごとに得意分野が異なり、複雑な問題にはGPT-5やGemini、速度重視ならGPT-5 miniなどが適している。
用途に応じてモデルを手動で選択することで、より効率的なコーディングが可能になる。
まずはGPT-4.1を試し、必要に応じて他のモデルを検討するのがおすすめ。

AWS初心者がAmazon Connectで簡単なコールセンターを構築した話
この記事では、Amazon Connectを使ったシンプルな自動音声ガイダンス付きのコンタクトセンター構築ハンズオンの体験を紹介しています。
電話をかけると、自動音声で「書籍」「音楽」の問い合わせ先を選択させ、選択に応じて担当者につなげる仕組みを、AWSのコンソール画面を交えながら手順を解説。
ハンズオンを通して、Amazon Connectの基本的な機能（インスタンス作成、電話番号取得、キュー設定、フロー作成など）を理解し、実際に電話をかけて動作確認を行っています。

Python開発の初速を上げるためのテンプレート設計
この記事は、個人開発の効率化のために「自分用開発テンプレート」を持つことの重要性を説いています。
テンプレートには、パッケージ管理、コードフォーマット、リンター、型チェック、テスト環境、API/フロントエンド基盤、CI/CD、リリース管理など、開発に必要な環境設定を予め組み込んでおくことで、新しいプロジェクトをすぐに開始できます。
紹介されているのは筆者個人の設定例であり、そのまま使うのではなく、生成AIを活用して自身の好みに合わせたテンプレートを構築することを推奨しています。
